name: wdpa_binary_201609
title: Global GDP Grid
description: The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) is the most comprehensive global database of marine and terrestrial protected areas. Dataset downloaded September 2016. This is a rasterized (binary) indicating protected areas. For more refined subsets of this data (i.e., different classes of protected areas), please contact us at geo@aiddata.org.

extras.citation: IUCN and UNEP-WCMC (2016), The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) [On-line], [September 2016], Cambridge, UK: UNEP-WCMC. Available at: www.protectedplanet.net.
